title: Business Analyst
description:
About Role :

In this role, you'll be responsible for leveraging data to drive business decisions, optimize revenue through data-driven pricing strategies, and ensure smooth inventory management. You'll work closely with cross-functional teams, providing key insights and reporting on performance to support strategic objectives and growth.




Roles & Responsibilities :

Dashboarding and Streamlining Key KPI data visualization process across teams.
Developing key insights from the data and sharing with relevant stakeholders for action.
Revenue optimization through data-driven Pricing Strategies, elevating click-through and conversion rates, impressions.
Manage Inventory health, ensure seamless product availability and minimizing stock outs for bestsellers.
Implement ROI-focused strategies by aligning pricing models with financial objectives.
Analyze and publish weekly/monthly margin reports and sales analysis; present findings and results to key stakeholders.
Conducting in-depth sales analysis, customer churn analysis, and retention strategies across all business units.
Tracking out monthly, quarterly and yearly KPIs and providing deeper insights in the business.
Collaborate with cross functional stakeholders and own the Business analysis charter end to end.




Eligibility :

Bachelor's degree in finance, accounting, business, economics, engineering , analytics, mathematics, statistics or a related technical or quantitative field.
Experience in working with databases, ETL and SQL in a business environment.
Relevant Business Analytics experience of 4-6 years.
Should have relevant experience in data analytics working with large data sets and to extract and transform data using various tools and technologies.
Should be able to use data to support ideas, drive actionable outcomes, and provide unique ways to present data and information in an easy to consume format.
Should be passionate about finding root causes, trends, and patterns and how they impact business.
Should be very comfortable juggling competing priorities and handling ambiguity.
Should be able to thrive in an agile and fast-paced environment on highly visible projects and initiatives.
Any experience in the Apparel category is a big plus.
